email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Fernandez,

We are pleased to offer mv SEA HORIZON for your 180,000 MT iron ore cargo ex Tubarão to Qingdao.
Rate: USD 22.50 CFR basis.
Laycan: 25-30 September
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 25,000/day.

Kind regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise to USD 20.00?

Best regards,
Alejandro Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alejandro,

We can offer USD 21.00 firm. Owners are very keen on this business and the vessel is in excellent condition.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Still a bit high. We have another offer at USD 20.50. Can you match or improve on this?

Regards,
Alejandro

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Alejandro,

Final offer: USD 20.75. Please advise soonest as stem is closing.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Done at USD 20.75. Please send recap.

Regards,
Alejandro
